title: Overall
stimulusHtml:
8-9:

  • contains a clear, well-developed thesis that reflects an understanding of change.

  • supports the thesis with substantial, relevant information.

  • understands the complexity of the question, including clear grasp of change.

  • effectively analyzes the social impact of the Depression and/or of New Deal agencies.

  • may contain minor errors.

5-7:

  • contains a clear thesis insufficiently focused on the question, or is presented with limited development.

  • supports the thesis with some factual, relevant information.

  • has limited understanding of the complexity; there is some sense of change.

  • describes and/or explains the social impact of the Depression and/or of New Deal agencies.

  • may contain errors that do not detract form the overall argument.

2-4:

  • lacks a thesis, or thesis is confused or undeveloped.

  • lacks supporting information, or information given is minimal.

  • may describe the Depression and/or list New Deal agencies with little or no concept of the social impact.

  • may contain major errors.

0-1:

  • may simply paraphrase or restate the question.

  • shows little or no understanding of either the question or the time period.
